data.title: Diversity In Gaming
data.meta_description: This guide houses information about Area 49's Diversity in Gaming Collection.
data.text:
Accessibility Maze

Representation: Accessibility

Available On: in browser game, free

Description: New to web accessibility experiences? Encounter a number of barriers you must work around, mirroring the experience of those who encounter these obstacles daily. Learn quick lessons on how to avoid or correct these common barriers.

Assassin's Creed Origins

Representation: Colorblind Mode

Available On: Xbox One

Description: Ancient Egypt, a land of majesty and intrigue, is disappearing in a ruthless fight for power. Unveil dark secrets and forgotten myths as you go back to the one founding moment: The Origins of the Assassin’s Brotherhood.

The Awesome Adventures of Captain Spirit

Representation: Mental Health, Grief, Coping

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Meet Chris, a creative and imaginative 9 year old boy who escapes reality with fantastical adventures as his alter ego, the Awesome Captain Spirit! Set in the Life is Strange universe.

Before I Forget (coming soon)

Representation: Indian protagonist

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: A narrative exploration game that examines a world where memories are constantly fading and jumbled. Explore the present to uncover the past, in a short story of love and loss and a life well-lived.

Before Your Eyes

Representation: Accessibility features including eye-tracking technology

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: A first person narrative adventure which tells the story of a soul's journey into the afterlife using a new and innovative form of interaction—your real-life blinks.

Blindscape

Representation: Blindness

Available On: mobile devices, free

Description: A game that takes place entirely through sound, with the narrative told from the point of view of a man in an authoritarian society who wants to escape his life by ending it.

Boyfriend Dungeon

Representation: Non-Binary protagonists, LGBTQ+

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Taking place in an urban fantasy setting, the player must fight through dungeons with the help of a human partner who can transform into a sentient weapon.

Catt Small Suites

Representation: Black, Women, Underrepresented Groups

Available On: in browser game, free

Description: A suite of online PC games designed by Catt Small, a Black woman that codes and builds online games that helps one understand the world around them. (i.e. microaggressions, race, gender, body image, etc.)

Celeste

Representation: Mental Health, Trans (protagonist & creator)

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Help Madeline survive her inner demons on her journey to the top of Celeste Mountain, in this super-tight platformer from the creators of TowerFall.

Civilization VI

Representation: Global Perspectives

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Play as one of 20 historical figures and find new ways to interact with your world, expand your empire across the map, advance your culture, and compete against history’s greatest leaders to build a civilization that will stand the test of time.

Far Cry 6

Representation: Latinx protagonist, Accessibility Features: customizable

audio, visual, and control settings

Available On: Xbox One

Description: Set in the adrenaline-filled world of a modern-day guerrilla revolution. As dictator of Yara, Anton Castillo is intent on restoring his nation back to its former glory by any means, with his son, Diego, following in his bloody footsteps.

Flower

Representation: Mental Health

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Take control of the wind as you explore and navigate beautiful, lush environments and journey through varied landscapes at your own pace. Interact with and changing the environment and find balance and harmony in your surroundings.

Gears 5

Representation: Women, LGBTQ+ characters, Accessibility

Available On: Xbox One

Description: With all out war descending, Kait Diaz breaks away to uncover her connection to the enemy and discovers the true danger to Sera herself in this epic campaign and brutal action across five thrilling modes.

Accessibly features: Full controller remapping, single stick movement, Adaptive controller support, narrated UI and menus, improved subtitles and more.

Ghost of Tsushima

Representation: Asian characters, Japanese and Mongol cultures

Available On: Playstation 4

Description: Set in 1274 on the Tsushima Island, the last samurai, Jin Sakai, must master a new fighting style, the way of the Ghost, to defeat the Mongol forces and fight for the freedom and independence of Japan.

Hades

Representation: LGBTQ+, Black, and Ethnically Diverse Characters, Global Perspectives

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion, Transistor, and Pyre.

Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice

Representation: Woman protagonist; Mental health, psychosis focus

Available On: Xbox One

Description: Follow Senua, a Pict warrior who must make her way to Helheim by defeating otherworldly entities and facing their challenges, in order to rescue the soul of her dead lover from the goddess Hela.

Horizon: Forbidden West

Representation: Woman protagonist

Available On: PlayStation 4

Description: Continue the story of Aloy, a young hunter of the Nora tribe and a clone of the Old World scientist Elisabet Sobeck, as she leads a band of companions on a quest to the arcane frontier known as the Forbidden West to find the source of a mysterious plague that kills all it infects.

Horizon Zero Dawn

Representation: Women Protagonist

Available On: Playstation 4

Description: In this Open World Action/RPG, play as skilled hunter Aloy who must use every ounce of her knowledge, intelligence, and agility to survive each encounter and overcome a much larger and technologically superior enemy.

Insecure: The Come Up Game

Representation: Black protagonist

Available On: mobile devices, free

Description: Based on the television world of Issa Dee and her friends from the hit HBO show Insecure. Hustle, heart and hype are your tools to build your new life in Los Angeles. With Issa and her crew as your guides, you navigate the messy business of adulting – learning to define yourself, fight for your city, cultivate your crew, and nurture your closest friends.

It Takes Two

Representation: Accessibility features for visually impaired players

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Play as the clashing couple Cody and May, two humans turned into dolls by a magic spell. Trapped in a fantastical world, they're reluctantly challenged with saving their fractured relationship by the suave love guru Dr. Hakim.

Kena: Bridge of Spirits

Representation: Asian protagonist, Woman protagonist

Available On: PlayStation 4; Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Follow Kena, a young spirit guide, who uses her magical abilities to help deceased people move from the physical to the spirit world.

Khet 2.0

Representation: Egyptian

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Using simple rules that can be learned in minutes, players alternate turns moving Egyptian themed mirrored pieces, after which they fire their laser with the goal of blasting their opponents Pharaoh to win the game!

The Last of Us II

Representation: LGBTQ+

Available On: Playstation 4

Description: When a violent event disrupts Ellie and Joel's peace, Ellie embarks on a relentless journey to carry out justice and find closure with the devastating physical and emotional repercussions of her actions.

Life is Strange: True Colors

Representation: Asian protagonist, Woman protagonist

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Alex Chen, a young woman who can experience the emotions of others, tries to solve the mystery behind a tragedy that happened in her life.

Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy

Representation: Accessibility features include descriptive captioning and specific difficulty options

Available On: Xbox One

Description: In this third-person action-adventure game, you are Star-Lord, and thanks to your bold yet questionable leadership, you have persuaded an oddball crew of unlikely heroes to join you. A chain of catastrophic events has been set off, and only you can hold the unpredictable Guardians together long enough to fight off total interplanetary meltdown.

Metroid Dread

Representation: Woman protagonist

Available On: Nintendo Switch

Description: Metroid Dread retells the story of the 2D Metroid games leading up to it, ending with Metroid Fusion. Now, Samus is dispatched to investigate by a currently unknown party and travels to ZDR. As the only being in the universe with immunity against the X Parasites, Samus seeks to uncover whether they truly still exist.

Monster Hunter: World

Representation: Women with realistic body proportions, Age Diversity

Available On: Playstation 4

Description: As a hunter, you'll take on quests to hunt monsters in a variety of habitats. Take down these monsters and receive materials to create stronger weapons and armor in order to hunt even more dangerous monsters.

Never Alone

Representation: Indigenous protagonist, Inupiat language dialogue

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Experience the epic journey of Nuna and Fox as they search for the source of an eternal blizzard that threatens the survival of everything they have ever known.

No Longer Home

Representation: LGBTQ+ and Non-Binary characters

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: A game about letting go of the life you've built due to circumstances beyond your control. Immerse yourself in the lives of Bo and Ao and learn about their dreams, frustrations and fears.

Papo Y Yo

Representation: Brazilian characters

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Quico’s best friend, Monster, is a huge beast with razor-sharp teeth, but that doesn’t scare Quico away from playing with him. That said, Monster does have a very dangerous problem: an addiction to poisonous frogs.

Quantum Break

Representation: Women, Black

Available On: Xbox One

Description: In the aftermath of a split second of destruction that fractures time itself, two people find they have changed and gained extraordinary abilities. One of them travels through time and becomes hell-bent on controlling this power. The other uses these new abilities to attempt to defeat him – and fix time before it tears itself irreparably apart. Both face overwhelming odds and make dramatic choices that will determine the shape of the future.

Remember Me

Representation: Female protagonist

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: A 3rd person action adventure where players take on the role of Nilin, a former elite memory hunter with the ability to break into people’s minds and steal or even alter their memories.

Shadow of the Tomb Raider

Representation: female protagonist, Indigenous language representation

Available On: Xbox One

Description: As Lara Croft races to save the world from a Maya apocalypse, she must become the Tomb Raider she is destined to be.

Sleeping Dogs Definitive Edition

Representation: Asian protagonist and characters

Available On: Xbox One

Description: Play as Wei Shen, the highly skilled undercover cop trying to take down the Triads from the inside out. You'll have to prove yourself worthy as you fight your way up the organization, taking part in brutal criminal activities without blowing your cover.

Stardew Valley

Representation: Accessibility features for low vision, colorblind, and deaf players; LGBTQ+

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: After inherited your grandfather's old farm plot, you set out to live off the land and see if you can turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home.

Swimsanity!

Representation: Afrofantasy, Black game designers

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Play as our hero Mooba, who uses a variety of unique power ups and weapons to survive in this aquatic world of this multiplayer shooter with Co-Op and Versus game modes.

Tell Me Why

Representation: LGBTQ+

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Reunited twins Tyler and Alyson Ronan use their supernatural bond to unravel the memories of their loving but troubled childhood. Your choices will affect their relationship, determine the strength of their bond, and shape the course of their lives.

Uncharted: The Nathan Drake Collection

Representation: Female characters

Available On: Playstation 4

Description: Follow the perilous journey of Nathan Drake across the globe, from humble beginnings to extraordinary discoveries, as he puts life and friendship on the line in a race against ruthless enemies to uncover unimaginable treasure.

Undertale

Representation: LGBTQ+

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: In this RPG, you control a human who falls underground into the world of monsters. Now you must find your way out... or stay trapped forever.

Game contains imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar condition.

The Unstoppables

Representation: Disability including blindness, cognitive impairments, wheelchair user

Available On: mobile devices, free

Description: Four friends, each with a physical or cognitive difference, unite their powers to make their way through challenging puzzle parcours and track down the mysterious thief of their beloved guide dog Tofu.

The Vale: Shadow of the Crown

Representation: Accessibility features include interactive audio game for visually impaired players

Available On: Gaming Lab PC Steam account

Description: Play as Alex, a blind princess, who has just been shipped off to a rural castle 500 miles away. However, things don't go as planned, as her carriage is attacked by raiders just short of their destination.

The Walking Dead Collection

Representation: Black protagonist

Available On: Xbox One

Description: Play as Lee Everett, a convicted criminal, who has been given a second chance at life in a world devastated by the undead. With corpses returning to life and survivors stopping at nothing to maintain their own safety, protecting an orphaned girl named Clementine may offer him redemption in a world gone to hell.

The Walking Dead Telltale Series: A New Frontier

Representation: Latinx protagonist

Available On: Playstation 4

Description: As Javier, a young man determined to find the family taken from him, you meet a young girl who has experienced her own unimaginable loss. Her name is Clementine, and your fates are bound together in a story where every choice you make could be your last.
